source_text: In addition, Thunderbird will grant the Seller's Representative (on behalf of all vendors) a 1.5% net smelter return royalty (Royalty) with respect to production of all metals from the Projects, with the Royalty to be payable by Kooky following commencement of commercial production.
additional_details: Royalty to be received by the Seller's Representative (on behalf of all vendors). Royalty to be paid by Kooky (which is being acquired by Thunderbird Resources).
